info.name: Jewelry Store - Complete Bulk Testing
info.description: Comprehensive sequential testing with bulk data for jewelry store API including stores, products (rings, necklaces, bangles), filtering, and pagination

item.name: 1. Store Setup
item.description: Create stores first - jewelry items will be added to these stores

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Main Street Showroom",
    "address": "123 Main Street, Downtown, New York, NY 10001",
    "latitude": 40.7128,
    "longitude": -74.0060,
    "operatingHours": "Mon-Sat: 10AM-8PM, Sun: 11AM-6PM",
    "contactPhone": "555-0101"
}

{
    "name": "Grand Mall Branch",
    "address": "456 Shopping Plaza, Level 2, Los Angeles, CA 90001",
    "latitude": 34.0522,
    "longitude": -118.2437,
    "operatingHours": "Mon-Sun: 10AM-9PM",
    "contactPhone": "555-0102"
}

{
    "name": "Downtown Boutique",
    "address": "789 Fashion Avenue, Chicago, IL 60601",
    "latitude": 41.8781,
    "longitude": -87.6298,
    "operatingHours": "Tue-Sat: 11AM-7PM, Sun-Mon: Closed",
    "contactPhone": "555-0103"
}

item.name: 2. Attribute Types
item.description: Create attribute types like Metal Type, Gemstone, etc.

item.name: 3. Attribute Values
item.description: Create attribute values for each type (Gold, Silver, Diamond, etc.)

item.name: 4. Categories
item.description: Create hierarchical categories for rings, necklaces, bangles

item.name: 5. Collections
item.description: Create collections like Bridal, Summer, etc.

body.raw:
{
    "sku": "RING-G-001",
    "name": "Classic Gold Ring",
    "description": "Timeless 14K gold ring with elegant design",
    "basePrice": 499.99,
    "isActive": true,
    "categoryId": {{fashionRingsCategoryId}},
    "collectionIds": [{{officeCollectionId}}],
    "attributeValueIds": [{{goldValueId}}, {{purity14KId}}, {{sizeMediumId}}, {{styleTraditionalId}}]
}

{
    "sku": "RING-P-ENG-001",
    "name": "Platinum Diamond Engagement Ring",
    "description": "Stunning platinum ring with 1 carat diamond",
    "basePrice": 2999.99,
    "isActive": true,
    "categoryId": {{engagementRingsCategoryId}},
    "collectionIds": [{{bridalCollectionId}}],
    "attributeValueIds": [{{platinumValueId}}, {{diamondValueId}}, {{sizeMediumId}}, {{styleContemporaryId}}]
}

{
    "sku": "RING-RG-WED-001",
    "name": "Rose Gold Wedding Band",
    "description": "Beautiful 18K rose gold wedding band",
    "basePrice": 899.99,
    "isActive": true,
    "categoryId": {{weddingBandsCategoryId}},
    "collectionIds": [{{bridalCollectionId}}],
    "attributeValueIds": [{{roseGoldValueId}}, {{purity18KId}}, {{sizeLargeId}}, {{styleContemporaryId}}]
}

{
    "sku": "RING-S-FASH-001",
    "name": "Contemporary Silver Ring",
    "description": "Modern silver ring with minimalist design",
    "basePrice": 199.99,
    "isActive": true,
    "categoryId": {{fashionRingsCategoryId}},
    "collectionIds": [{{summerCollectionId}}, {{officeCollectionId}}],
    "attributeValueIds": [{{silverValueId}}, {{sizeSmallId}}, {{styleContemporaryId}}]
}

{
    "sku": "RING-G-RUBY-001",
    "name": "Gold Ring with Ruby",

}
